titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: QUESTION OF PRIVILEGE - Under Rule IX, Ms. Pelosi rose to a question of the privileges of the House and submitted for immediate consideration, H. Res. 687.
Mr. Boehner moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 187, 6 Present (Roll no. 13).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/16/2006--Introduced. Directs the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to begin an immediate investigation into the abuse of power surrounding the inaccuracies in the process and enrollment of the Budget Reconciliation legislation (S. 1932) cleared for the President on February 1, 2006.
